title: SIGSEGV in mrb_class
vulnerability_information:

-------------------

Attached as test_mrb_class.rb):

activities.message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to two weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for reporting this bug! This is an automated response to let you know that we've received your issue, and we'll process it as soon as possible.

Due to the large volume of reports we have received, it may take us up to two weeks to respond. Thank you for your patience!

activities.message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the issue and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3547
activities.markdown_message: Thank you for your report. We've reproduced the issue and opened an issue upstream: https://github.com/mruby/mruby/issues/3547

activities.message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was resolved upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/74712c73ac9471fd388d76b0f12229ec428d5146.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place in approximately one week, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.
activities.markdown_message:
Thanks again for your report. This issue was resolved upstream in https://github.com/mruby/mruby/commit/74712c73ac9471fd388d76b0f12229ec428d5146.

Our next round of bounty decisions will take place in approximately one week, so we'll be in touch with you again soon.

activities.message: Thanks for helping improve the security of Shopify and the MRuby project!
